Safe cleaning products are rare to find these days. So many claim to be safe and toxic-free, while others truly are. One thing to consider when buying a true safe and toxic-free cleaning product is does it actually work? I have slowly switched out all my cleaning products based on a few different rationales (reasons!): Alkylphenols: Found in most detergents and cleaners - linked to breast cancer Phthalates: Found in air fresheners, household cleaners, and plastics. Linked to endocrine cancer. Benzene - found in most cleaners and linked to blood diseases Styrene - Found in most household cleaners - linked to cancer, organ toxicity, reproduction defects I could go on and on. Bottom line is this: Most products you buy from the grocery store contains one or more of these chemicals. Unfortunately the list goes on and on.
